body_html: @alextp By the way, the only issue I am currently encountering with the eager API is that I get exceptions when I invoke TFE_Execute for the same context, concurrently multiple times. Is a context supposed to only be used one thread at a time?
body_text: @alextp By the way, the only issue I am currently encountering with the eager API is that I get exceptions when I invoke TFE_Execute for the same context, concurrently multiple times. Is a context supposed to only be used one thread at a time?
body: @alextp By the way, the only issue I am currently encountering with the eager API is that I get exceptions when I invoke `TFE_Execute` for the same context, concurrently multiple times. Is a context supposed to only be used one thread at a time?
